statements: UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substitution_name = 'Substitute A', substitution_description = 'Description A' WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substitution_description = 'Description B', substitution_name = 'Substitute B' WHERE ingredient_id = 2;
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substitution_name = 'Sugar', substitution_description = 'sweetener' WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substitution_description = 'alternative', substitution_name = 'Honey' WHERE ingredient_id = 2;
UPDATE recipe_variations SET steps_description = 'Mix all ingredients well and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes' WHERE variation_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substitution_reason = 'Allergic to original ingredient' WHERE substitution_id = 2;
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substituted_ingredient = 'Cheese' WHERE original_ingredient = 'Milk';
UPDATE recipe_variations SET variation_name = 'Spicy Variation', ingredients_list = 'Salt, Pepper, Chili Powder', steps_description = 'Add spices and cook on high heat' WHERE variation_id = 3;
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substitute_ingredient = 'Cheese' WHERE original_ingredient = 'Milk';
UPDATE recipe_variations SET description = 'A delicious twist on the classic recipe' WHERE variation_name = 'Spicy Version';
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substitute_ingredient = 'Butter' WHERE original_ingredient = 'Margarine';
UPDATE recipe_variations SET description = 'This is a healthy variation of the original recipe' WHERE variation_name = 'Healthy Version';
UPDATE Ingredient SET name = 'Sugar', category = 'Sweetener' WHERE ingredient_id = 1;
UPDATE Recipe SET description = 'A delicious cake recipe' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE Ingredient SET category = 'New Category' WHERE name = 'Salt';
UPDATE Recipe SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE recipe_id = 1;
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substituted_ingredient = 'Mushrooms' WHERE original_ingredient = 'Tomatoes';
UPDATE recipe_ingredients SET quantity = 2.5, unit_of_measurement = 'cups' WHERE recipe_id = 101 AND ingredient_id = 5;
UPDATE ingredient_substitutions SET substituted_ingredient = 'Almond Flour' WHERE original_ingredient = 'Wheat Flour';
UPDATE recipe_ingredients SET quantity = 2.5, unit_of_measurement = 'cups' WHERE recipe_id = 101 AND ingredient_id = 205;
